name: Shrink!
description:
Shrink!

Shrink! is Paz Games submission for the Ludum Dare 34! It was developed for the "Jam" in less than 5 hours.

The objective is take the Trees down and last the longer you can! But you can only take down Big Trees when on Big mode, and Small Trees when on Small mode!

You will Shrink or Grow by pressing either "Down" or "Up", respectively.

Play and Share!

Show your support by sharing this game with your friends and family!

Donations are also accepted, and used to keep our development active!
